verses.verse: The <S%G746>beginning<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G32>messenger<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> shall <S%G2680>prepare<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G4675>thee.<s%>

The <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2090>Prepare<s%> ye <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5147>paths<s%> <S%G2117>straight.<s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> <S%G1096>did<s%> <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2784>preach<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there went <S%G1607>out<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5561>land<s%> of <S%G2449>Judea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they of <S%G2415>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4215>river<s%> of <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G1843>confessing<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G266>sins.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> clothed <S%G1746>with<s%> <S%G2574>camel's<s%> <S%G2359>hair,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> with a <S%G2223>girdle<s%> of a <S%G1193>skin<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3751>loins;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he did <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G200>locusts<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G66>wild<s%> <S%G3192>honey;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2784>preached,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> There <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G3588>one<s%> <S%G2478>mightier<s%> than <S%G3450>I<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G3450>me,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2438>latchet<s%> of <S%G848>whose<s%> <S%G5266>shoes<s%> <S%G3739>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2425>worthy<s%> to stoop <S%G2955>down<s%> and <S%G3089>unloose.<s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> have <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5204>water:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> shall <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> coming <S%G305>up<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5204>water,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G4977>opened,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> a <S%G4058>dove<s%> <S%G2597>descending<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> him: <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1096>came<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> saying, <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I am well <S%G2106>pleased.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1544>driveth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G4567>Satan;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> wild <S%G2342>beasts;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>him.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> that <S%G2491>John<s%> was put in <S%G3860>prison,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> is <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is at hand: <S%G1448><s%> <S%G3340>repent<s%> ye, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> gospel. <S%G2098><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> as he <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G906>casting<s%> a <S%G293>net<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G231>fishers.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Come <S%G1205><s%> ye <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G3450>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G231>fishers<s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> they <S%G863>forsook<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G1350>nets,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G4260>gone<s%> a little <S%G3641>farther<s%> <S%G1564>thence,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> son of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G846>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> were <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2675>mending<s%> their <S%G1350>nets.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> he <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> hired <S%G3411>servants,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1531>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> and <S%G1321>taught.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2258>taught<s%> <S%G1321><s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> one that <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1122>scribes.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he cried <S%G349>out,<s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> Let us <S%G1436>alone;<s%> what have we to do with <S%G5101>thee,<s%> <S%G2254><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4671><s%> thou <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3479>Nazareth?<s%> art thou <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G2248>us?<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> thou <S%G1488>art,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> Holy <S%G40>One<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Hold thy <S%G5392>peace,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1831>come<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> had <S%G4682>torn<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> he <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2284>amazed,<s%> insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> they <S%G4802>questioned<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G848>themselves<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> What <S%G5101>thing<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5124>this?<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> is <S%G3778>this?<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G2596>with<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G2004>commandeth<s%> he <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they do <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G189>fame<s%> spread <S%G1831>abroad<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> region round <S%G4066>about<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>forthwith,<s%> when they were <S%G1831>come<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> they <S%G2064>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4613>Simon's<s%> wife's <S%G3994>mother<s%> <S%G2621>lay<s%> sick of a <S%G4445>fever,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>anon<s%> they <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>her.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2902>took<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> by <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and lifted her <S%G1453>up;<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4446>fever<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> at <S%G3798>even,<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2246>sun<s%> did <S%G1416>set,<s%> they <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that were <S%G2192>diseased,<s%> <S%G2560><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> them that were possessed with <S%G1139>devils.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> gathered <S%G1996>together<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2374>door.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> that were <S%G2192>sick<s%> <S%G2560><s%> of <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G3554>diseases,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1140>devils;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G863>suffered<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1140>devils<s%> to <S%G2980>speak,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> in the <S%G1773>morning,<s%> rising <S%G450>up<s%> a great while before <S%G3029>day,<s%> <S%G4404><s%> he went <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>solitary<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> and <S%G2546>there<s%> <S%G4336>prayed.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> that were <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> followed <S%G2614>after<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when they had <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> men seek <S%G2212>for<s%> <S%G4571>thee.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Let us <S%G71>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2192>next<s%> <S%G2969>towns,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I may <S%G2784>preach<s%> there also: <S%G2546><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> therefore <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> came I forth. <S%G1831><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2258>preached<s%> <S%G2784><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>devils.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G3015>leper<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3870>beseeching<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> kneeling <S%G1120>down<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> thou <S%G2309>wilt,<s%> thou <S%G1410>canst<s%> make me <S%G2511>clean.<s%> <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> moved with <S%G4697>compassion,<s%> put <S%G1614>forth<s%> his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> I <S%G2309>will;<s%> be thou clean. <S%G2511><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he straitly <S%G1690>charged<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G2112>forthwith<s%> sent him <S%G1544>away;<s%> <S%G846><s%>
